snippet.title: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (Nintendo DS) Any% WR - 2:19:16
snippet.description:
A little side project I did. Decent run. I don't think I'll be improving on this time. -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/samabam14

0:00 - I reset the console after starting a new game to skip the intro cutscenes. I do this after each boss fight as well. (21:24, 1:04:10, and 1:40:40)

41:00 - First use of rewind trick. By rewinding twice I'm able to avoid fall damage. 

42:05 - Used to do a rewind trick here but then I found this funny skip that is faster. 

1:27:16 - The only double rewind trick in the run. First I use a rewind to reset the game's fall counter. This allows me to fall all the way to the bottom, where I do a normal rewind trick to cancel fall damage. I bought an extra sand tank upgrade at the start of world 3 to make this possible.
